front.title: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) IPv4 and IPv6 Option for a Location Uniform Resource Identifier (URI)

abstract.t: This document creates a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) Option for the downloading of a Location Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of a client, to be dereferenced in a separate transaction. Once the location URI is received by an endpoint, it can be dereferenced by the client to learn its geographic location, or sent to another entity to learn this client's location.
